verbs.description: James Comey , once a longtime [V: registered] [ARG1: Republican] , said he was " ashamed " of the Republican Party 's response to President Donald Trump 's rhetoric .
[ARG0: James Comey , once a longtime registered Republican ,] [V: said] [ARG1: he was " ashamed " of the Republican Party 's response to President Donald Trump 's rhetoric] .
James Comey , once a longtime registered Republican , said [ARG1: he] [V: was] [ARG2: " ashamed " of the Republican Party 's response to President Donald Trump 's rhetoric] .
